name: Log Begone
note: Not all log messages are passed through the mod's filter.

name: Essential
note: Will not be present in Mod Menu

name: Fast Leaf Decay (Hydos)
note: Tries to crash the game as part of a targetted harassment campaign against Quilt and its users

name: ChatTriggers
note: Modules can be loaded and managed, but are unable to be executed on Quilt.

name: Deep Mob Learning: Refabricated
note: Crashes the game if there is another mod that utilises QSL libraries (as opposed to Quilted Fabric API ones)

name: CreativeCore
note: Occasionally breaks the search tab in the creative mode item screen, and spams errors in logs. The issue can be fixed via using its `/cmdclientconfig` command to set `playSoundWithOffset` to `false`. Relevant issue: https://github.com/CreativeMD/CreativeCore/issues/205.

name: Essential
note: Prevents Quilt clients from connecting to local worlds on 1.20.2+. Provided direct help to developers and was turned down. Issue on their end. See: https://gist.github.com/OroArmor/66632962acdd4bbbacc71d858befab29
